Impression and Plan
Called re pt 's elevated BP o/n .
Pt without symptoms of CP , SOB or Headache .
Pt here with thoracic fracture .
Attempted to medicate with pain medicine as HR also slightly elevated .
Slight improvement but on 6 AM vitals pt found to be hypertensive again .
HR allowed for a one time dose on lopressor 25 mg PO .
Primary team to address in the AM .
